channel.title: Go Humble! RSS SOFTWARE
channel.description: Awesome RSS Feeds about HumbleBundle software bundles!

item.title: Vegas Pro 2024
item.description: Our best-selling Vegas Pro bundle is back!
item.content:encoded: Content creators, influencers, and other video savvy friends—we’ve curated the ultimate bundle for you. Get the Vegas Pro Bundle by MAGIX and take your video editing to the next level. You’ll get the renowned and easy to learn video editing package VEGAS Pro Edit 21, packed with sophisticated compositing features as well as integrated audio and effects. Also included is SOUND FORGE Pro 17, a powerhouse audio editing suite with extensive plugin support, designed to deliver flawless masters. Start using these, and other easy to learn video editing software today. Pay what you want for this astounding bundle and help Make A Wish with your purchase!

item.title: Lens Legends: The Ultimate Photographer's Toolkit
item.description: Edit like a legend of the lens
item.content:encoded: Level up your photo skills with The Ultimate Photographer’s Toolkit Bundle from Ashampoo! Perfect for seasoned photographers and hobbyists alike, enhance your knowledge in a variety of editing disciplines. Get the power of advanced editing software like Ashampoo SHARPEN #5 Professionals, Ashampoo ZOOM #2 professional, Ashampoo HDR #10 professional, and more. Become a Lens Legend—and help support Cancer Research UK with your purchase today!

item.title: Build Smarter: The Low/No-Code Development Essentials
item.content:encoded: Learn to build smarter with our hottest no-code software bundle from the experts at Packt! Perfect for experts and novices—get tools like Power Automate - A Guide to Power Automate Desktop, MindStudio Mastery - Automate Workflows and Build Gen AI Apps, and The Complete Masterclass on PL-900 Certification—and help support Alzheimer’s Research UK with your purchase!

item.title: Unreal Survivors Flash Sale
item.description: Bring brain eaters to life in Unreal
item.content:encoded: Game developers, build horrific or hilarious zombie worlds with the Unreal Survivors Flash Sale! Save cash on high-quality collections featuring a variety of zombie skins, animations, models, and more, alongside other amazing supporting assets for use in Unreal Engine. Create a variety of fun zombie scenarios limited only by your imagination. This Flash Sale Bundle is great for professionals or hobbyists looking to create in Unreal and save some money. Get the assets you need to help bring your game to life and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: IK Pro Sound Suite Encore
item.content:encoded: Take your music creation to the next level with the Ultimate Sound and Groove Workstation Bundle from IK Multimedia. Download over 600 GB of professional, genre-defining and genre-defying pianos, drums, guitars, bass, brass, orchestral instruments, organs, synthesizer sounds, and many premade loops, presets, and more. Get the sounds you need to bring your ideas to life and into the ears of millions, while supporting Music Will with your purchase!

item.title: Ultimate 2D and 3D Artist Bundle
item.content:encoded: Animate and create art like a professional with the Ultimate 2D and 3D Artists Bundle from Graphixly LLC. Perfect for artists looking to break into gaming, and industry veterans alike, this amazing bundle will have you creating in 2D and 3D in no time! Get tools and software like Moho Pro 12.5, Painstorm Studio, Realistic Paint Studio, and more—and help support Direct Relief with your purchase. Bring your creations to life today!

item.title: Ultimate Unreal Mega Bundle
item.description: Unlock a universe of curated assets
item.content:encoded: Game developers and sound engineers, give your creations life with rich audio and vibrant visuals with our Ultimate Unreal Mega Bundle! This high-quality collection features a plethora of unique sounds and models for your environments, characters, soundtracks, and more for use in popular engines like Unreal. Get a gigantic bundle of assets to help bring your games to life and help support Direct Relief with your purchase!

item.title: Blender Core Skills: The Ultimate Blender Basics Bundle Remix
item.description: Your Blender skills just got better
item.content:encoded: Learn the basics of Blender with this bundle of courses from CG Cookie! This comprehensive curriculum will help you master the fundamentals of Blender with topics like Fundamentals of Mesh Modeling, Fundamentals of Digital Sculpting, Fundamentals of Materials and Shading, and more! Get the Ultimate Blenders Basics Bundle and take your skills to the next level with the expert advice and knowledge recorded in Blender 4.2 LTS. Help support One Tree Planted with your purchase!ics of Blender with this bundle of courses from CG Cookie!

item.title: Animate Everything 3D with Anything World
item.content:encoded: Level up your 3D asset creation, animation and world building skills with this amazing bundle from Anything World! Generate and animate hundreds of 3D models and bring your imagination to life! Learn to create in 3D with tutorials to help you sharpen your skills with professional courses on: how to make a platform game in Unity, how to create ready made environments, and how to make an isometric game in Unity. Get the expert advice and knowledge you seek, and help support Cancer Research UK with your purchase!

item.title: Vocal Master Collection - Acapellas, Loops & Plugins For Music Production & Game Design
item.description: A new music bundle? Sounds nice!
item.content:encoded: This comprehensive audio bundle includes popular WA Production collections like Vocal Compressor, Mutant Reverb, and more! Create breathtaking soundscapes, master intricate vocal effects, and produce tracks across any genre with ease using an expansive range of professional tools and vocal libraries. From lush vocal harmonies to gritty shouts, this collection is packed with endless possibilities. Perfect for seasoned producers, sound designers, and creators who want to push boundaries and produce studio-quality projects with unparalleled creativity. Get the assets you need to achieve the sound you’re looking for, and help support Music Will with your purchase!

item.title: Gamedev Market: Best of 2024
item.content:encoded: Game developers, build your worlds with this bundle of 75+ assets from GameDev Market! This massive collection features a diverse range of high-quality assets, including detailed tilesets, unique character sprites, huge music and sound effects packs, and so much more. Perfect for indie developers and seasoned studios alike, this bundle has everything you need to help bring your game to life, and help support The Michael J. Fox Foundation with your purchase!

item.title: DESIGN with CorelDRAW & PERFECT with AI
item.content:encoded: Master one of the most widely adapted design programs with our CorelDRAW 2024 Bundle. Get amazing software like Corel Painter 2023, PaintShop Pro 2023, and Vision FX. Learn professional graphic design software with vector, technical illustration, and CAD software options to design logos, posters, drafting, and more. Level up your creative skills and help support Children’s Miracle Network Hospitals today!
